item.description:
Hi ladies!

Our next get together will be held at The Charlie Horse in West Bridgewater. Very easy to get to and tons of parking. The band Dick and Jane will be playing 10/16 and they always draw a great crowd!! If you're not familiar with The Charlie Horse, they have a large bar, arcade games, pool tables and a large dance floor. Oh, and tons of flat screens if you happen to want to catch a game or the news..hehe. The band goes on at 10pm and I believe there is a $5 cover charge. Drinks and food are reasonably priced so this night out won't send you home with empty pockets:-).

Please feel free to bring friends and come earlier or later. All I ask is that you try and keep your RSVP updated so we know how many to expect.

Thanks and hope to see tons of old and new faces!!!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I will let you know what color top I will have on as the date nears.......
item.name: Drinks and Dancing (if you like to dance!) at The Charlie Horse West Bridgewater
